description:
Five Nights at Freddy's Plus was a fan-made reimagining of the original Five Nights at Freddy's, developed by Phisnom as part of the Fazbear Fanverse Initiative. It was originally planned for release on Steam in 2022, but was cancelled in August 2023.

The game was intended to be a more challenging and suspenseful version of the original game, with new mechanics, animatronics, and lore. However, it was also plagued by development problems, and was ultimately cancelled due to "unforeseen circumstances."

Despite its cancellation, Five Nights at Freddy's Plus remains a popular fan game, and many fans are still hoping that it will be released someday.

How to Play Five Nights at Freddy's Plus

The game is played from the first-person perspective of a night security guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. The player's goal is to survive five nights by monitoring the security cameras and using the doors and lights to defend themselves from the animatronics.

Mechanic

The game features several new mechanics, including:
  • Flashlights: The player can use flashlights to temporarily blind the animatronics.
  • Doors: The player can close the doors to their office to prevent the animatronics from entering.
  • Audio Cues: The player can listen for audio cues to track the movements of the animatronics.

Animatronics

The game features several new animatronics, including:

  • Spring Bonnie: A springlock animatronic that can switch between a rabbit and a human form.
  • The Puppet: A marionette that can teleport around the pizzeria.
  • The Wolf: An animatronic that can crawl through vents.

Lore

The game features several new lore elements, including:

  • The Afton Family: The game reveals more about the Afton family, who are responsible for creating the animatronics.
  • The Safe Room: The game introduces a new safe room that the player can use to hide from the animatronics.
  • The Anomaly: The game introduces a new anomaly that is causing the animatronics to become more aggressive.

Tips

Here are some tips for playing Five Nights at Freddy's Plus:

  • Use your flashlights sparingly: Flashlights can be helpful, but they will also drain your battery power. Only use them when you need to.
  • Don't open the doors too often: Opening the doors will make you more vulnerable to the animatronics. Only open them when you absolutely need to.
  • Pay attention to the audio cues: The audio cues can give you valuable information about the movements of the animatronics.
  • Be patient: The game is very challenging, so don't get discouraged if you die a few times. Just keep practicing and you will eventually get the hang of it.
